channel.title: Halo 3: Reach
channel.description:
Are you guys excited for Halo 3: Reach? I've been a Halo fan since the first, so yes. I am very excited. Please, I don't care for your opinion that "omg hal0 sukkzzz balllzzz!11one1! coq of doody modirn gayfuckstupid is bettr1!!one!" Cus, Idc.
Anyway, here's a picture: ( I found it pretty cool (: ) [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2cru54z.jpg[/img]

item.title: Halo 3: Reach
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Is it going to come out for the PC too like the only good Halo?

Bungie announced it, said they were “Working on it”.
Which I find is absolutely bullshit. Like, a few months after the release of Halo 3 for xbox360, Bungie announced it was going to be released on pc soon. It’s been like a year, I would of hoped it came out by now. Oh and I bet most people will say “0mg give dem time!!1one!11 dey r bizzy!11one11”
No, halo 2 came out on pc a few weeks after it came out on Xbox.
So, I guess we’ll see. ODST won’t be around for a while though, I can tell you that.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3: Reach
item.dc:creator: @mchccjg12 mchccjg12
item.description:
@mchccjg12 wrote:

I have Halo 3:ODST and i must say, they did a nice job with the graphics, firefight mode is good, but the fact that you cant really COMPLETELY customize you multiplayer character is dissapointing… Campaign would be better if they added a bit more story to it and kept the same amount of fighting, other than that i would sya that this game is OK.

item.title: Halo 3: Reach
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Tico:

ODST was way to hyped, and I seriously think Halo fans are lying through their teeth about it. Honestly, a successful game will hold new content, not just a new campaign with the same boring multiplayer and even the same maps. Seriously, that’s pathetic. This is closely similar to Call of Duty: WaW: but, it had a new campaign going off of a different time era, which changed the multiplayer; however they didn’t change the modes that much. Bungie did an ok job on the campaign, but it was definitely not worth the $60-70 it sold for.

I partly agree, though ODST didn’t use the same storyline, let alone the same maps. It is a completely different story and has mostly nothing to do with master chief or anything done in halo 2 / 3.
There are a few copied features from halo 3, yes. Forge, and a few custom games like slayer and CTF?
But they also added a SHIT load of things. New maps, 13+. DLC, New online gametypes, New mode “Firefight”.
In my honest opinion, I think it was a pretty good game. Campaign is too short though,
I beat the whole game on legendary in like 3-4 hours with a few buddies of mine.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 3: Reach
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Reisyukaku, post:25, topic:303810”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=400086.msg2968991#msg2968991 date=1253825801]
Will they fucking move on to Halo 4?
[/quote]they already said that halo was going to be a trilogy. They said that about 2 yrs ago. trilogy = 3. There not even going to bother finishing the halo story with another series.

[quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=400086.msg2968989#msg2968989 date=1253825728]
Yeah but campaign is one of the main thingys of the game and yeah online sucks.
[/quote]GTFO my moparscape newfag, everyone has there own opinion and all i said was that reach is probably gonna suck. Now good day sir. :)[/quote]

Because the mother fuckers are lazy? Or maybe not creative enough to make up a new storyline?

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:20, topic:303810”]“I haven’t tried the campaign yet but from what i see its not worth it”. Campaign is one of the best and most important aspects of the game.[/quote]most people would say the online play is what counts… i could beat the game in a day and become very bored of it fast, but when you have a good multiplayer it adds to the replay value so to speak. in my opinion portal would probably be the only game that has a good story with no online.
